messages.subject: game help
messages.msgSnippet: Joe bought me Roller Coaster Tycoon with the Loopy Landscapes expansion pack and I am having a ball playing this game.  However, I am not so great at building
messages.messageBody:
Joe bought me Roller Coaster Tycoon with the Loopy Landscapes expansion pack and I am having a ball playing this game. However, I am not so great at building my own coasters, especially those that would go inside a mountain, etc. I am also having difficulty figuring out how to join a path to something at a higher grade, I can't figure out the platform deal.

I have watched the tutorial(not enough detail), gone to the RCT website(way more advanced than I) but I need help in between. I was wondering if any of you or your kids play/love this game and could give a newbie some assistance.

You can contact me on list or off, just make sure the heading refers to the game.

TIA,

sistakammi/Karen M.

PS. I can't wait for Dana to read so she can play this game - it has so many learning opportunities! Math, marketing, physics and on and on - plus it is flat out fun!!!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
